markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Alghollthu Lash](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1881)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 35 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 350 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This fleshy _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48)_ is obviously crafted from the tentacle of some fearsome beast, likely an [alghollthu](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=1), and constantly drips slime.

<document level="2" id="action-1575" />

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include a tentacle from an alghollthu.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Alghollthu Lash
